comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Lilla Brokaw Gilbert Dugmore (b. 1873); cousin of Olympian Irving Brokaw: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Irving_Brokaw cousin of George Tuttle Brokaw (through whom she became kin to Jane Fonda): en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Tuttle_Brokaw Married to Henry Bramhall Gilbert and Cyril Patrick William Francis Radclyffe Dugmore; mother of Florence Gilbert Tucker: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/8079897524/] Mrs. Dugmore, elsewhere on Flickr: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2404816631/]

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content:
pennylrichardsca:

Thanks for the details on Mrs. Lilla Dugmore and her relationship with other people in Bain images.  We will update the descriptions to include more information about her.
